item.title: United pkz devo team
item.dc:creator: @x_united_x x united x
item.description:
@x_united_x wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:367558”]Post what you need any how many of a position you are looking for e.g

Forum Developers 1/2
Website Developers 1/2
BETA Testers 1/10
Server Coder 1/10

Kinda like that[/quote]

ight

Read full topic

item.title: United pkz devo team
item.dc:creator: @x_united_x x united x
item.description:
@x_united_x wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:367558”]Name: AJ
Position: Administrator, Server Coder or Website Coder
Experience: You should know
Time Zone/Activity: If you mean what country, its New Zealand 8:49pm atm
Why I am interested: Because i want you to make a half decent server[/quote]

aceepted

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:367546”]I would apply for the development, however I’m not sure what else you are needing. Please be more specific with this mate.

As for the development all together, it doesn’t seem that bad. However, the base that you are using; it’s a bad one, very, very, very bad one. The bugs, dupes, and glitches are horrible and I just hope you have the patience to even work with it.

Good luck.[/quote]

thats why im here =)

Read full topic

item.title: United pkz devo team
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I would apply for the development, however I’m not sure what else you are needing. Please be more specific with this mate.

As for the development all together, it doesn’t seem that bad. However, the base that you are using; it’s a bad one, very, very, very bad one. The bugs, dupes, and glitches are horrible and I just hope you have the patience to even work with it.

Good luck.

Read full topic
